name: Rocky Castle (itch)
description:
Story

After Warrior deceived the people and caused a rebellion, he implemented the plans in his mind and killed the king. Warrior, who became the head of the kingdom, turns the good people into slaves in a more ruthless way than the deceased king.

In the multiplayer part of the game, it tells the civil war between the people with different game modes.

Rocky Castle - How To Play

WASD - Move

Left Click - Attack/Build Blueprint

Right Click - Build Block

F - Use Catapult

This game is developed for Bogazici Game Jam 2021.
